text:
So here's something interesting
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Ftopic%2Fkb5034441-windows-recovery-environment-update-for-windows-10-version-21h2-and-22h2-january-9-2024-62c04204-aaa5-4fee-a02a-2fdea17075a8&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C0649cacd0c70467938c208dc12223df4%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638405185486466378%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=gICgYtHwD2hTqoChhiKIARBehV3XRONafkKuE4Wlpc4%3D&reserved=0
It's called a security update but unless you sync the "update" section it's not
on WSUS. WSUS classification Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) and Microsoft
Endpoint Configuration Manager Yes This update will automatically sync with WSUS
if you configure Products and Classifications as follows: Product: Windows 10,
version 1903 and later Classification: Updates
Link: None

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
